comment.author: 45454456@N02
comment._content: I think this is one of the Anchor Line triplets, JUNIATA, OCTORARA, or TIONESTA.

comment.author: 23121382@N07
comment._content: Thanks for your comment. 'Huronic' is what's written on the negative file, but there's certainly no guarantee that this is correct!

comment.author: 70966013@N02
comment._content: If you blow up the image, you can see the word "Tonesta" on the bow of the ship. It's not crystal clear, but it's obvious if you know that that's one of the words you're looking for.

comment.author: 23121382@N07
comment._content: Thanks for this clarification - have amended the description accordingly.
